data.name: Omni-Blade Attachment
data.description: Attach an omni-blade (bayonet) to the weapon.
data.feature: In addition to it's other properties, this weapon is also considered a melee weapon. It has the finesse property and successful melee attacks deal 1d8 piercing damage.

data.name: High-Caliber Barrel I
data.description: Superior kinetic coils increase shot penetration and damage.
data.feature: Increases the weapon's weight by one half. 1 on ranged attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

data.name: High-Caliber Barrel II
data.description: Superior kinetic coils increase shot penetration and damage.
data.feature: Increases the weapon's weight by one half. 2 on ranged attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

data.name: High-Caliber Barrel III
data.description: Superior kinetic coils increase shot penetration and damage.
data.feature: Increases the weapon's weight by one half. 3 on ranged attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

data.name: Stunner
data.description: Small attachment to muzzle, causing shock damage to meleed targets.
data.feature: In addition to it's other properties, this weapon is also considered a melee weapon. Successful melee attacks deal 1d6 bludgeoning + 1d4 piercing damage and, if the target is unprotected and maintaining a concentration spell, automatically fails its saving throw to maintain the spell.

data.name: Cranial Trauma System
data.description: Increase headshot lethality by balancing barrel calibration so that ammunition pierces bone and explodes in soft tissue.
data.feature: When you roll a critical hit with this weapon, roll 1 additional damage die.

data.name: Stability Damper I
data.description: Distributes recoil with sliding system of counterweights compatible with kinetic coil generators, reducing weapon kickback.
data.feature: +1 on ranged attack rolls made with this weapon.
data.availability: Assault Rifle, Smg, Shotgun, Sniper Rifle

data.name: Stability Damper II
data.description: Distributes recoil with sliding system of counterweights compatible with kinetic coil generators, reducing weapon kickback.
data.feature: +2 on ranged attack rolls made with this weapon.
data.availability: Assault Rifle, Smg, Shotgun, Sniper Rifle

data.name: Stability Damper III
data.description: Distributes recoil with sliding system of counterweights compatible with kinetic coil generators, reducing weapon kickback.
data.feature: +3 on ranged attack rolls made with this weapon.
data.availability: Assault Rifle, Smg, Shotgun, Sniper Rifle

data.name: Precision Scope
data.description: Simple 4x optical scope to enhance stability while zoomed.
data.feature: Double the weapons normal and long range

data.name: Thermal Scope
data.description: Detects creatures using thermal signatures.
data.feature: Increases the weapon's weight by one half. Looking through the scope gives the wielder Infrared Vision. When making a ranged weapon attack, you may choose whether or not to use Infrared Vision.

data.name: Ultralight Materials
data.description: Superior lightweight alloys replace weapon parts, making weapon less obtrusive and easier to handle.
data.feature: Reduces the weapon's weight by one half.

data.name: Power Magnifier
data.description: Generator designed to enhance the effectiveness of tech or biotic attacks.
data.feature: +1 on biotic and tech damage rolls while holding this weapon.

data.name: Concentration Mod
data.description: Biometric sensors and auto-targeting software adjust to the user's pulse and breath rate, assisting aim.
data.feature: If you reduce your speed to 0 for the turn, ranged attack rolls with this weapon score critical hits on rolls of 19 & 20.

data.name: Piercing Ammo
data.description: Capacitor boosts kinetic coil generators, increasing shot penetration.
data.feature: Damage done by this weapon cannot be reduced by piercing damage resistance.
data.availability: Assault Rifle, Heavy Pistol, Sniper Rifle

data.name: Shredder Ammo
data.description: Shoot pellets covered in Tungsten for increased damage.
data.feature: You may use a bonus action to toggle the following effect on or off: damage type becomes slashing. Damage done by this weapon cannot be reduced by slashing damage resistance.

data.name: Quick Release Magazine
data.description: State of the art thermal clip housing allows for faster ejection and insertion.
data.feature: You may reload this weapon as a bonus action.
data.availability: Assault Rifle, Heavy Pistol, Smg, Sniper Rifle

data.name: Magazine Upgrade
data.description: Increases magazine capacity, allowing more shots before reload.
data.feature: Weapon gains additional heat equal to 1/2 its base heat (rounded down).

data.name: Extended Magazine
data.description: Increases magazine capacity, allowing more shots before reload.
data.feature: Weapon gains a additional heat equal to its base heat.

data.name: Heat Sink
data.description: Greatly improves your weapons cooling capacity.
data.feature: Weapon gains additional heat equal to double its base heat.

data.name: Cryo Ammo
data.description: Fire supercooled projectiles.
data.feature: You may use a bonus action to toggle the following effect on or off: damage type becomes cold. Successful ranged weapon attacks cause the target to become {primed-cold} and reduce its movement speed by half until the end of its next turn.

data.name: Disruptor Ammo
data.description: Fire statically charged projectiles.
data.feature: You may use a bonus action to toggle the following effect on or off: damage type becomes lightning, Successful ranged attacks can detonate primed targets or cause the target to become {primed-lightning} until the end of its next turn.

data.name: Incendiary Ammo
data.description: Fire super-heated plasma.
data.feature: You may use a bonus action to toggle the following effect on or off: damage type becomes fire. Successful ranged attacks deal an additional 1d4 fire damage and the target becomes {primed-fire} until the end of it's next turn.

data.name: Warp Ammo
data.description: Fire tiny dark matter charges.
data.feature: You may use a bonus action to toggle the following effect on or off: damage type becomes necrotic damage. Successful ranged attacks detonate primed targets and a target with an active barrier will have 2 barrier ticks removed and cannot benefit from the barriers damage reduction for this attack.

data.name: Explosive Ammo
data.description: Fire exploding projectiles
data.feature: You may use a bonus action to toggle the following effect on or off: Successful ranged attacks deal and additional 1d8 thunder damage, but each attack drains 2 heat.

data.name: Phasic Ammo
data.description: Fire projectiles that vibrate rapidly, allowing them to bypass kenetic barriers.
data.feature: You may use a bonus action to toggle the following effect on or off: -2 on ranged weapon damage rolls, but all damage done bypasses shields.

data.name: Combat Sensor
data.description: Scanning radar that alerts you when enemies are within your vicinity.
data.feature: While this weapon is equipped, you have advantage on initiative rolls. In addition, you and any of your companions within 10m of you can't be surprised, except when incapacitated. The sensor awakens you and your companions within range if any of you are sleeping naturally when combat begins.
